I've played the version before convoy, convoy was pretty crap. The previous versions of this game could get very boring indeed. I used to have accidents falling asleep at the keyboard. Or, no matter what, you always wish that the truck would go a little bit faster :P

it is full version but on my pc when i start the game with a diff resolution than my desktop in the configuration utility at the start of the game it crashes but i can change the resolution isnide the game anyhow.

FULL LEGIT GAME.  CHEATS DO NOT WORK.
SEED LIKE A MOTHER

This is the real deal, and yes, the cheats DO work, you just have to edit these lines in the "Config.cfg" that lies in "/My documents/18 WoS Haulin"

"uset g_console "0"
"uset g_developer "0"

to


"uset g_console "1"
"uset g_developer "1"

and then write the codes in the "§"-console ingame... That works for me.
can any1 give me yhe link for the file please pm me or send me a direct email on lucianadams2005@hotmail.com
